channel.title: Ints to a string - advance ppl only
channel.description:
ok, so try to make a sort of minigame; but i need this: i got 3 cases with each a number public int number = 0;
case 1: number = 1 case 2: number = 2 case 3: number = 3
now they need to press on cases in different order and it needs to safe it: so first press case 2, number = 2 , then case 3, number = 23 (the 2 from prev case), then case 1, number = 231 then i need that number (231) in a string
that is what i need
how would i do that? plz help me

item.title: Ints to a string - advance ppl only
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:192715”]sb.append(int)
no need for a switch statement[/quote]
Oh, you’re right. He wanted a number, and then he wanted that number to be converted to a String, not String to int.

Read full topic
item.source: Ints to a string - advance ppl only

break;
